Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Suggestions
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("suggestions", "Send or manage suggestions!")]
public class SlashSuggestions : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<SuggestionsService>, IInteractionModuleBase

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

Accept(string)

Accepts a suggestion.

Declaration
[ComponentInteraction("accept:*", true, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(ChannelPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task Accept(string suggestId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string suggestId

The unique identifier of the suggestion to be accepted.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

This command changes the state of a suggestion to accepted, triggering any configured response or action.

| Edit this page View Source

Accept(ulong, string?)

Accepts a specific suggestion.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("accept", "Accepts a suggestion", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task Accept(ulong suggestid, string? reason = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong suggestid

The ID of the suggestion to be accepted.
string reason

The reason for accepting the suggestion.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of accepting a suggestion.
Remarks

This command changes the status of a suggestion to accepted and can trigger additional configured actions or responses.

SetSuggestChannel(ITextChannel?)

Sets the suggestion channel for the guild.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("setchannel", "Sets the suggestion channel.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageChannels)]
public Task SetSuggestChannel(ITextChannel? channel = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ITextChannel channel

The text channel to be set as the suggestion channel. If null, suggestions will be disabled.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

This command allows guild administrators to designate a specific text channel for suggestions. Setting the channel to null will disable the suggestion feature.

| Edit this page View Source

Suggest()

Initiates the process for a user to send a suggestion via a modal interaction.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("suggest", "Sends a suggestion to the suggestion channel, if there is one set.", true, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task Suggest()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

This command opens a modal for the user to enter their suggestion, ensuring it adheres to the set character limits.

| Edit this page View Source

SuggestClear()

Clears all suggestions from the guild.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("clear", "Clears all suggestions. Cannot be undone.", false, RunMode.Default)]
public Task SuggestClear()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
Remarks

This action is irreversible. It deletes all suggestions and their associated data from the guild.
